front.title: Profile for DCP Congestion Control ID 0:Single-Window Congestion Control

abstract.t: This document contains the profile for Congestion Control Identifier 0, Single-Window Congestion Control, in the Datagram Control Protocol (DCP) [DCP]. DCP implements a congestion-controlled, unreliable flow of datagrams suitable for use by applications such as streaming media. The Single- Window Congestion Control CCID is used by senders that promise to send no data whatsoever, except possibly for a single initial window of data sent at the beginning of the connection.
